snippet: A traffic violation 10 years ago has led to the political downfall of the British cabinet minister Chris Huhne and put the intimate details of his former marriage on display.
abstract: Traffic violation 10 years ago has led to political downfall of British cabinet minister Chris Huhne and put intimate details of his former marriage on display; both he and ex-wife Vicky Pryce may go to prison--he for lying about being the driver who was speeding and her for perverting course of justice by falsely certifying that she, and not her husband, was the driver.
lead_paragraph: A traffic violation 10 years ago has led to the political downfall of the British cabinet minister Chris Huhne and put the intimate details of his former marriage on display.

headline.seo: A Ticket, a Lie and a British Official’s Downfall
headline.main: Official’s Speeding Fine Builds to Lurid Scandal
headline.print_headline: Official’s Speeding Fine Builds to Lurid Scandal
